verses.name: Job 3:22
verses.text: Which rejoice exceedingly, and are glad, when they can find the grave?

verses.name: Job 3:23
verses.text: Why is light given to a man whose way is hid, and whom God hath hedged in?

verses.name: Job 3:24
verses.text: For my sighing cometh before I eat, and my roarings are poured out like the waters.

verses.name: Job 3:25
verses.text: For the thing which I greatly feared is come upon me, and that which I was afraid of is come unto me.

verses.name: Job 3:26
verses.text: I was not in safety, neither had I rest, neither was I quiet; yet trouble came.
